Subject: Unable to see Device code or serial number in EPP Console
Description: Unable to see Device code or serial number in EPP Console
What_We_Know__c: Customer encounter an issue with one of their device ( Google  Pixel 8a ) which doesn't receive the device code or serial number in the console.
Next_Steps__c:
We will schedule a remote session with the customer to investigate this further.

We had a remote session with the customer where we discovered that the EPP client was not communicating with the server, due to the missing IP, port and department. 

After we reinstall the client the issue has been solved. 

We have also install the DPI certificate since it was missing.
Account_Name__c: Cognizant Technology Solution India Pvt Ltd
